author: BillMartinJr./EricCarle
title: Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?
summary: A treasured classic in an all-new format! Nearly 30 years--and more than 2.5 million copies--after its conception, Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See? remains one of the most beloved children's books of all time. Now, this charming tale is available in a board book format--just right for the tiniest hands. Full color.
